name: New World of Pirates
description:
- Pirate Ship Simulator,
- Survive,
- Build Your Base,
- Upgrade Base Buildings,
- Upgrade Your Ship,
- Collect Materials,
- Collect Loots From Enemies,
- Duel Against Pirates,
- Explore Water World,
- Weather Changes,
- 3D Turn Based Duel Simulation,
- Produce Materials in Your Base Buildings,

The earth was getting warmer and the glaciers were beginning to melt. The storms were relentless, oceans rising, waves reaching unprecedented heights. The dimensions of the disaster were increasing day by day, the cities flooding. Now an endless water world. You managed to survive thanks to the platform you set up on the water. Before long, your desire to explore flared up. You built a small ship. You wanted to jump on your ship and set sail right away. When you set sail, you realized that you weren't the only survivor...
